concept.title: The Concept
concept.intro: Treating your year like a themed party makes everything easier.
concept.point1: We have too many choices, too many hobbies, and not enough willpower to explore new things in depth.
concept.point2: New Year's Eve usually feels like a letdown. We celebrate the changing of the date, but rarely the changing of our purpose.
concept.solution: The Solution: Theme of the Year
concept.idea: Just like a party theme sets the music and dress code, a Year Theme decides your trips, hobbies, and gifts.
concept.vision: One big decision on NYE simplifies thousands of small ones during the next 365 days.

core.title: Strict rules
core.rule1: On the night of December 31st, a new theme is chosen and set for the upcoming year.
core.rule2: Once the theme is set, it cannot be changed throughout the year.
core.rule3: A dedicated budget must be allocated to explore the theme.
core.rule4: Plan at least one family trip specifically around the theme.

suggestions.title: Suggestions for a better experience
suggestions.sug1: Theme can be anything from broad to very specific, but it must offer both a destination where it's prominent and activities to pursue throughout the year.
suggestions.sug2: Sign up for a regular themed activity at the start of the year (e.g., a class, a club, or a subscription).
suggestions.sug3: You can continue last year's activities if you enjoyed them, but you must embrace the new theme too.

learning.title: What we've learned
learning.item1: It makes gift-giving and souvenir-hunting much easier and more meaningful throughout the year.
learning.item2: Provides ready answers for "what should we do today or next week?"
learning.item3: Creates engaging conversations in social settings - people love sharing their knowledge about the theme, and knowing your theme leads to great recommendations.

examples.title: Some examples of our experience so far:
examples.newYear: New Year's Eve transformed into an exciting planning session, with the goal of choosing next year's theme by midnight

teaYear.title: Tea Year Highlights:
items: Discovered and visited tea tastings in every new city
Made finding local tea spots a priority while traveling
Exchanged tea sets as Christmas gifts

spaceYear.title: Space Year Activities:
items: Studied NASA's missions and future plans
Planned trips to Texas (NASA and SpaceX) and Florida (launch sites)

footer.subtitle: Theme of the year
footer.closing: I think this helps us have meaningful experiences and makes life more interesting.
